data.name: RuleTerm
desc: A term is used to select objects to which a rule should apply.

items.name: CaseSensitive
lines: this flag indicates whether a string "operand" shall be compared case sensitive.

items.name: Operand
lines: the value of the property used to compare with the document property.

items.name: Operator
lines: the operator used to compare the property of the document with the given value (e.g.
The value can be one of the RuleOperator constants.

items.name: Property
lines: the name of the property used to match the term.

items.name: RegularExpression
lines: this flag indicates whether a string "operand" shall be treated as a regular expression.
